page.title: 05 Save The Children
page.content: In many parts of the world children are alone, ill or dying of starvation. The Save The Children organisation is trying to help this. We were working as usual when our teacher suggested we should do something to help the starving people of Ethiopia and other places where there is drought and war going on. First we sent a note round the school asking everybody to bring in any books or toys they had grown tired of. We said our sale was to help the "Save The Children" fund. Every day children brought in bags of books and toys.They covered the desks and the floor until there was no space left. On Friday morning we put everything into piles on the tables with price tickets on,and hoped for the best.The total was Â£82!
